name: codelab-bootstrap
description: use nodemon to watch changes on md file, rebuild codelab on saves

scripts.watch: nodemon --watch boomi-salesforce-codelab.md --exec 'claat export boomi-salesforce-codelab.md && lsof -c claat -t | xargs kill && cd boomi-salesforce-codelab && claat serve'

author: Andrew Roberts
